<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Download Serverless Layer Bundle</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v33.00/images/twistlock_defender_layer.zip"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"manageDefenders"}
```



Returns a ZIP file with a Lambda layer containing the Defender runtime.
